name: Red Haven
description: Overview:  In Red Haven, there are mysteries and secrets that have been locked away!  In this horror game, the player can investigate the complex and discover what's inside or maybe who.  There are multiple levels filled with jump scares, puzzles, and patterns that the player will have to follow if they want to survive!  The player will also have to be stealthy and know when to hide from enemies within the complex.  Feedback is much appreciated!
